text: appeal addehattinre janatayile satyanisedhikalaya pramanimar parannu: "nannalute neattattil ni nannaleppealulla oru manusyan matraman. nannalile nis'saranmar matraman, karyavicaramillate ninne pintutarnnatayi nannal kanunnat. nannalekkalere oru sresthatayum ninnalil nannal kanunnilla. matramalla; ninnal kallavadikalanenn nannal karutunnu.â€
